pr_title: Move get keys section to CI/CD

timeline.message: Move get keys section to CI/CD

timeline.bodyText: I think this is not the DefaultApplication but a new app created by CTL. Shall we do a small tweak to correct this?
timeline.author: malinthaprasan
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -247,6 +247,44 @@ The **apictl** tool should be installed in the automation servers to begin the p - For example, if an API is in the `PUBLISHED` state in the development environment, it will also be in the same state in the testing environment. This default behavior can be changed via the **apictl** tool, which assigns APIs the `CREATED` state after importing. + +### (G.) - Get keys for an API + +Follow the instructions below to generate a JWT/OAuth token for testing purposes using CTL in order to invoke an API by subscribing to it using the default application:
